p.span: As the COVID-19 School Closure has been extended into the fourth quarter, BRCSD will be adjusting our instructional plan.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; color: black;

br.span: Please review the letter to Parents/Guardians and Students, as well as the Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for the fourth quarter.
